Name: Guillotine
Effect: Inflicts Wounds. Damage Roll is Half of the Foe's remaining HP (up to 15) rounded down. If the remaining HP of the foe is 1 this move fails. Ignore the foe's Defenses. -3 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon uses the sharpest part of its body to almost snap the neck of its foe. It is a devastating attack. The foe must be lucky to get out of it alive.
